bibl.title: La morte di Giovanni Pascoli in due lettere di Ermenegildo Pistelli.
bibl.note: Transcriptions of two letters written in 1912 by the Italian papyrologist Ermenegildo Pistelli (to Teresa Lodi and to Enrico Bemporad). - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Rosario Pintaudi, La morte di Giovanni Pascoli in due lettere di Ermenegildo Pistelli.
Transcriptions of two letters written in 1912 by the Italian papyrologist Ermenegildo Pistelli (to Teresa Lodi and to Enrico Bemporad). - Avec résumé en anglais.
